name: Rodger Rover
description:
Rodger Rover is an augmented reality (AR) pet game where you have a Mars Rover as your companion. 

Interact and take care of the Mars Rover throughout the space mission. 

Venture throughout the augmented environment and discover the vastness of Mars.

Use the image below to make your own pet rover appear.

This game was made by a team of students from iAcademy

  • Lead Designer/Programmer  - Xvyce
  • Lead Programmer - bulletproofpancake
  • Lead Artist -  Maejima
  • 3D Artist/3D Animations - Sean Ramos
  • 3D Arist/3D Animations/Programmer - Grios
